articles.author: Ashish Dangwal
articles.title: China’s Shandong, US’s Nimitz Aircraft Carrier ‘Deployed For Action’ As Taiwan’s President, US House Speaker’s Meet - EurAsian Times
articles.description: The military activity in the Taiwan Strait intensified on April 5, with both China and the United States deploying their aircraft carriers to the waterway that separates Taiwan from mainland China.
articles.content:
The military activity in the Taiwan Strait intensified on April 5, with China and the United States deploying their aircraft carriers in the waterway between Taiwan and mainland China.
